Instruction: In a medium bowl, whisk together egg whites, vinegar, and salt until soft peaks form. Gradually add sugar, continuing to whisk until glossy and stiff peaks form.
Fold in the chopped nuts and coconut gently until evenly distributed.
Bake in the preheated oven for 1 hour. Turn off the oven and let the pavlova cool completely in the oven with the door closed.
Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes. Turn off the oven and let the pavlova cool inside. Invert onto a plate and top with fresh fruit and whipped cream.
